Package it.polimi.ingswPSP35.server.controller.divinities

Class Prometheus

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingswPSP35.server.controller.divinities.Divinity
it.polimi.ingswPSP35.server.controller.divinities.Prometheus
public class Prometheus
extends Divinity
This class is the implementation of the divinity Prometheus. Prometheus can build both before and after moving if he doesn't move up.

This behaviour is achieved with a custom implementation of AbstractTurn and a special method.

Author:
Paolo Galli

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Description copied from class: Divinity
      Method used to identify divinities. It returns this Divinity's name as it is spelled in the official rulebook (in english), starting with a capital letter. This also coincides with the class name.
      Specified by:
      getName in class Divinity
      Returns:
      Divinity's name

    • restrictedMove

      public boolean restrictedMove​(Coordinates destinationCoordinates)
      Attempts to move selectedWorker to Square destination. If the attempt is successful, the board is notified of what squares have been affected by the move action.

      Unlike the move method, this does not allow selectedWorker to move up.

      Parameters:
      destinationCoordinates - the Square one wishes to move to
      Returns:
      true if the move action attempt was successful

    • getTurn

      public AbstractTurn getTurn()
      Description copied from class: Divinity
      Returns an implementation of AbstractTurn specific to the concrete Divinity that implements this method
      Overrides:
      getTurn in class Divinity
      Returns:
      an implementation of AbstractTurn
